description: Information about a third party that provided this content from outside this document's hosted organization.
title: Distributor

___name.description: The human-readable name of the distributor of this content. E.g., Reuters.

$eref.description: A grab-bag object for non-validatable data.
$eref.title: Has additional properties

___subcategory.description: The machine-readable subcategory of how this content was produced. E.g., 'freelance - signed'. May vary between organizations.

___category.description: The machine-readable category of how this content was produced. Use 'staff' if this content was produced on behalf of the organization who owns this document repository. (Multisite note: content produced within a single *organization*, but shared across multiple *websites* should still be considered 'staff.') Use 'wires' if it was produced for another organization and shared with this one. Use 'other' for all other cases.
